# 🚀 Welcome to your new awesome project!

This project has been created using **webpack-cli**, you can now run

```
npm i phevt
```

usage

```
import PhEvt from 'phevt'
//接口介绍
interface PhEvt{
    on(e:string,fn)=>void
    once(e:string,fn)=>void
    off(e:string,fn?)=>void
    emit(e:string,...args:any)=>void
}
```
